sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: The man and info pages of CVS are fairly good, but let's list a basic set of commands which all editors will use on an almost daily basis. There are many more options available than the ones listed here, so you will want to read the CVS documentation at some point, and run the cvs --help command. You can also get a basic list of CVS commands by running cvs --help-commands
Some commands have two forms, the long and the short. We'll list both in the descriptions.
